content: round 10 * ssk p1 repeat from * around round 11 * k2tog repeat from * around 12 sts round 12 * k2tog repeat from * around 6 sts cut yarn and thread through remaining sts pull up tight and anchor to inside weave in all ends ©2024 plymouth yarn company 102824jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s stitch es ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together in that position k2tog = knit 2 sts together tbl = through the back loop m1 = make 1 = place bar between last st and next st onto needle and knit into back of it to increase 1 st p2tog = purl 2 sts together
